values: 经过；通过；穿过；过；允许；发生；使达到（某位置）；转移给；遗留给（继承人等）；转变；传送；传球；结束；走过；及格；经表决通过；批准（动议、法律等）；不出牌；及格；排泄；使（货币等）流通；（纸牌等游戏中）不叫
通过；经过；通行证；出入证；传球；通道；通路；途径；及格；合格；入场券；乘车券；车票；关口

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 尚可的；可通行的；（钱币等）可流通的
过路人；旅客；考试合格者

word_mean_info__list.difference: 书面用词，指时间等不知不觉地逝去，含义比pass窄，常常侧重从某一特定时间到另一特定时间的过去。
最普通常用词，指岁月的流逝，某些自然现象或事情的过去。侧重其结果。

word_group.brief_definition: 传递下去；传承下去；传承
传递, 传给, 传达
逝去, 消逝, 消磨
昏倒, 失去知觉；结束新兵训练；分发
经过；路过；（时间等的）逝去
被认为合格, 达到要求；获得接受
小便, 小解, 解小手

bilingual.source: I know I could pass that test.
bilingual.target: 我知道我能通过那次考试。

bilingual.source: I hope to pass the exam to get into senior high school.
bilingual.target: 我希望通过考试进入高中。

bilingual.source: How many marks do you need to pass the English exam?
bilingual.target: 你需要多少分才能通过英语考试？

bilingual.source: If you practise a lot, you're sure to pass the exam.
bilingual.target: 如果你练习很多，你一定会通过考试。
她祝愿自己能通过考试。

list.abstract: 单词pass，既可以作为动词使用又可以作为名词使用，作为动词，有及物与不及物之分，为“经过、通过”之意，作为名词是“穿过”的意思。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I have one answer for that: Pass a bill.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我对此只有一个回答:通过一个移民法案。

yingyinNormal.en: But you can pass. You can make it through Dauntless. I have seen it before.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是你会通过的，你可以通过无畏派的测试的，我之前见过了。

yingyinNormal.en: It's not a simple pass-fail. It's an evaluation tool we use to separate applicants.
yingyinNormal.zh: 考试不是通过没通过这么简单，而是我们区分申请者的评估手段。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, it'll pass. Because you are going to push it until it goes through both houses and gets on the books.
yingyinNormal.zh: 会通过的，因为你们要让法案通过参众两院，成为立法。

yingyinNormal.en: To reach the terminal, you'll need to pass the main gates.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要抵达这个终端计算机，你需要通过几扇设施大门。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, of course they are. And the chances are the legislation won't pass.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然了，而且这项法案很可能不会通过。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, between you and me, I'm not even sure this gun bill is gonna pass.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我只跟你说，我都不确定这项枪支法案能否通过。

yingyinNormal.en: The Leg office predicts the Senate version will pass in two to three weeks.
yingyinNormal.zh: 立法办公室预测参议院法案将在两三周内通过。

yingyinNormal.en: Stories like Amy's are why we fought so hard to pass the Affordable Care Act.
yingyinNormal.zh: 像艾米这样的故事是我们如此努力奋斗通过平价医疗法案的原因。

yingyinNormal.en: Our hosts began to pass the Turing test after the first year. But that wasn't enough for Arnold.
yingyinNormal.zh: 第一年后，接待员们开始通过了图灵测试，但是阿诺德不满足于此。

yingyinNormal.en: This isn't prove, it's a test, like everything else. The only way to pass, is to go back.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这不是让你去证明什么，就像之前的一切，只是他们的考验，通过考验的唯一办法，就是回去。

yingyinNormal.en: Now it is a bit of a bottleneck here. And more than 50,000 motorcycles will pass through on their way home for the festivities.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这就像是个瓶颈，超过5万的摩托大军，将在春节回家路上通过这里。

yingyinNormal.en: What does it say? Only the prince who bears the key shall pass. Just that. Then some boring stuff about the great fallen dead.
yingyinNormal.zh: 它说什么？“只有手持钥匙的王子才可以通过”。就这样？还有一些无聊的关于战死勇士的事。

yingyinNormal.en: And five months later, Democrats, Republicans, and Independents in the Senate came together to pass a commonsense compromise bill.
yingyinNormal.zh: 五个月后，参议院的民主党人，共和党人以及独立党派人士一起通过了常识性的妥协性法案。

yingyinNormal.en: What am I being tested for? Oh, it's not important. But if you don't pass, none of this matters. Okay, what's the next test?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你给我计分干什么? 这不重要。但如果你没通过，现在做的这些也用不上了。下一项测试是什么？

yingyinNormal.en: Now, I still believe that the best way to solve this problem is by working together both parties: to pass that kind of bipartisan law.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在，我仍然相信解决这一问题的最好方式是团结起所有党派，投票通过这一两党都支持的法案。

yingyinNormal.en: But first, we need the outgoing Congress to pass a budget and keep our government open. A Christmas shutdown is not a good idea.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但首先，我们需要即将结束任期的国会通过预算，并保证我们政府的运作，圣诞期间的停摆不是好主意。

yingyinNormal.en: If the Republicans fail to pass a reasonable omnibus package by demanding entitlement reform, they will force the federal government into a spending freeze.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果共和党无法通过福利改革，达成合理的综合解决方案，就会迫使联邦政府冻结开销。

yingyinNormal.en: And Congress should pass a bill to let students refinance their loans at today's lower interest rates, just like their parents can refinance their mortgage.
yingyinNormal.zh: 国会也应该通过立法，在当前的低利率条件下，让学生可以转换贷款，就像他们的父母转按揭住房贷款一样。

yingyinNormal.en: In the fortnight leading up to New Year's Eve, over 3 million people will pass through these ticket barriers, to get a train from here. That's over 200,000 people a day.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在除夕前的两星期开始，超过300万人将会通过这些检票口，从这里乘坐火车，那意味着每天超过20万人。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 经表决通过(议案/法律等)
经过; 穿过; 通过
发生; 说出; 做出
(回答竞赛题时)不知道; 过

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 旁道；旁路；分流术；旁通管；分路
n. 经过；通过；通道；走廊；过道；过渡；转变；一段；一节；章节；段落；乐段；巴沙基
n. 乘客；旅客；滥竽充数者；冗余人员
adj. 经过的；路过的；过去的；流逝的；逝去的；微小的；快速的；轻松的

word_family.mean: v. 经过；穿过；通过；超过；越过；度过；消逝；流逝；传递；传送；转移；批准；宣布；排泄；放弃；弃权

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 传递下去；传承下去；传承

sense_info_list.en: (of an official group of people) give approval to something, especially by voting to make it law
sense_info_list.zh: 经表决通过(议案/法律等)

examination_example.sentence: Last Thursday, the French Senate <highlight>passed</highlight> a digital services tax.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 上周四，法国参议院通过了一项数字服务税。

examination_example.sentence: Under the ruling Thursday, states can <highlight>pass</highlight> laws requiring out-of-state sellers to collect the state's sales tax from customers and send it to the state.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据周四的裁决，各州可以通过法律，要求外州的销售者从客户那里收取该州的销售税，并将其送到该州。

examination_example.sentence: Nothing would be more important than <highlight>passing</highlight> some kind of G.I. Bill for the 21st century.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对21世纪而言，没有什么比通过《美国退伍军人权利法案》之类的法案更重要的事情了。

sense_info_list.en: give something to someone

examination_example.sentence: This forces users to be more conscious of their role in <highlight>passing</highlight> along information.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这迫使用户更加意识到自己在传递信息中的角色。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Pass</highlight> a candle around a circle of happily married and respected couples to bless the union.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在一圈婚姻幸福、受人尊敬的夫妇周围传递蜡烛来祝福他们的结合。

examination_example.sentence: Science's idea which to <highlight>pass</highlight> some papers to statisticians has some merit.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 《科学》杂志把一些论文交给统计学家的想法有一定的价值。

sense_info_list.en: go past something or someone or move in relation to it, him, or her
sense_info_list.zh: 经过; 穿过; 通过

examination_example.sentence: We feel a pressure to fill these different-sized bottles (days, hours, minutes) as they <highlight>pass</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当这些不同大小的瓶子(日、小时、分钟)经过时，我们会感到一种压力。

sense_info_list.en: go past something by being greater in amount or degree

examination_example.sentence: In 2009 the number of unionists in America's public sector <highlight>passed</highlight> that of their fellow members in the private sector.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2009年，美国公共部门的工会会员人数超过了私营部门的会员人数。

examination_example.sentence: British Land Art is a kind of landscape-orientated light conceptual art created <highlight>passing</highlight> through.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 英国的地景艺术是一种经由创作的以自然景观为导向的光概念艺术。

examination_example.sentence: The success of Sci-Hub, which relies on researchers <highlight>passing</highlight> on copies they have themselves legally accessed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Sci-Hub的成功依赖于研究人员将他们自己合法获取的拷贝传递出去。

sense_info_list.en: an official document or ticket showing that you have the right to go somewhere or use a particular form of transport

examination_example.sentence: The district is essentially giving a <highlight>pass</highlight> to students who do not do their homework because of complicated family lives.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该学区允许一些学生因复杂的家庭生活而不做家庭作业。

sense_info_list.en: be successful in an exam, course, or others

examination_example.sentence: Passengers who <highlight>pass</highlight> a background check are eligible to use expedited screening lanes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过背景调查的乘客有资格使用快速安检通道。

sense_info_list.en: go away
go past a particular point in time
pronounce (a judgement or judicial sentence)
Happen; be done or said
sense_info_list.zh: 发生; 说出; 做出

sense_info_list.en: remove waste from the body
change from one state to another
a difficult or unpleasant condition

sense_info_list.zh: (回答竞赛题时)不知道; 过

word_usage.usage: pass是双宾语动词，表达“把某物递给某人”可以说pass sth. to sb.，也可以说pass sb. sth.。
pass by sb./sth.是指通过；经过，而pass sb./sth. by是指未影响某人或某事。
pass和spend都可以表示“度过时间”，表示在等待的过程中做某事打发时间，可以用 pass the time，表示一段时间已经流逝，可以用pass，例如：The first few days passed（最初几天过去了），而表示花一段时间做某事或呆在某个地方，用 spend，例如：I spent three days cleaning our flat（我花了3天打扫我们的公寓）。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 旁道；旁路；分流术；旁通管；分路
n. 经过；通过；通道；走廊；过道；过渡；转变；一段；一节；章节；段落；乐段；巴沙基
n. 乘客；旅客；滥竽充数者；冗余人员

word_family.mean: v. 经过；穿过；通过；超过；越过；度过；消逝；流逝；传递；传送；转移；批准；宣布；排泄；放弃；弃权

sense_info_list.en: (of an official group of people) give approval to something, especially by voting to make it law
go past something or someone or move in relation to it, him, or her

examination_example.sentence: Given the amount of time we spend in classrooms, and the number of shoes that <highlight>pass</highlight> through them every day, you may understand.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 考虑到我们在教室里花费的时间，以及穿过教室的鞋子数量，你可能就会理解。

sense_info_list.en: give something to someone

examination_example.sentence: Through regular regional educational meetings, a large annual meeting, individual farm visits and thousands of phone calls, the Amburghs <highlight>pass</highlight> on the principles pasture management.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过定期的区域性教育会议，大型年会，个人农场访问和数千个电话，Amburghs 传达了牧场管理的准则。

sense_info_list.en: be successful in an exam, course, or others
go past a particular point in time
an official document or ticket showing that you have the right to go somewhere or use a particular form of transport

word_usage.usage:
单指参加考试或已参加完毕，但不提考试结果时不能用pass，要用take。pass指“考及格，通过”。
示例：我将在星期四参加音乐考试。
误 I am going to pass my music examination on Thursday.
正 I am going to take my music examination on Thursday.

pass表示“批准，通过”时，不能用于被动结构。
示例：该提议已经被当地政府批准通过。
误 The proposal has been passed by the local government.
正 The local government has passed the proposal.
pass sb. sth.=pass sth. to sb.都表示“递某物给某人”。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 经过；通过；通道；走廊；过道；过渡；转变；一段；一节；章节；段落；乐段；巴沙基
n. 乘客；旅客；滥竽充数者；冗余人员
n. 旁道；旁路；分流术；旁通管；分路
adj. 经过的；路过的；过去的；流逝的；逝去的；微小的；快速的；轻松的
adj. 尚可的；过得去的；满意的；可通行的；能通过的

word_family.mean: v. 经过；穿过；通过；超过；越过；度过；消逝；流逝；传递；传送；转移；批准；宣布；排泄；放弃；弃权

sense_info_list.en: (of an official group of people) give approval to something; especially by voting to make it law

examination_example.sentence: California legislators <highlight>passed</highlight> a bill last year that will bring ethnic studies to all its public high schools.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 加州立法者去年通过了一项法案，将把种族研究引入所有公立高中。

sense_info_list.en: go past a particular point in time

examination_example.sentence: It will gradually <highlight>pass</highlight> away without teachers' help.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没有老师的帮助，它会逐渐消失。

examination_example.sentence: "I don't think the heyday (鼎盛时期) has <highlight>passed</highlight>, "says D. J. Jayasekara, owner and founder of lunchbox.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 午餐盒的所有者和创始人D. J. Jayasekara说，“我不认为鼎盛时期已经过去了。”

examination_example.sentence: Venice's deadline <highlight>passed</highlight> with barely a murmur (嘟哝) this summer, just as UNESCO was meeting in Istanbul.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 今年夏天，就像联合国教科文组织(UNESCO)在伊斯坦布尔开会时一样，威尼斯的最后期限几乎没有声音了。

sense_info_list.en: give something to someone

examination_example.sentence: However, these savings result from <highlight>passing</highlight> costs on to workers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，这笔节省的资金是通过将成本转嫁给工人实现的。

examination_example.sentence: Such momentary thoughts were represented in words and <highlight>passed</highlight> down across generations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种瞬间的想法被用文字表达出来，代代相传。

examination_example.sentence: In fact, the slugs use the genetic material so well that they <highlight>pass</highlight> it on to their future generations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，绿海姑蚧很好地利用了这种遗传物质，并将其遗传给后代。

sense_info_list.en: go past something or someone or move in relation to it; him; or her

examination_example.sentence: A race <highlight>passes</highlight> through it annually.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每年都有一场比赛经过它。

examination_example.sentence: Just beyond St. Mark's Square, a cruise ship <highlight>passes</highlight>, one of hundreds every year that appear over their medieval (中世纪的) surroundings.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在圣马克广场(St. Mark's Square)的正上方，有一艘游轮经过，每年有数百艘游轮出现在他们的中世纪周围。

sense_info_list.en: be successful in an exam; course; or others

examination_example.sentence: Students fail to finish the ninth grade with <highlight>passing</highlight> grades in college preparatory coursework.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在大学预科课程中，学生未能以及格成绩结束九年级。

examination_example.sentence: You are not allowed to drive a car unsupervised until you have <highlight>passed</highlight> a driving test.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在你通过驾驶考试之前，不允许在无人监督的情况下驾驶汽车。

examination_example.sentence: "Make sure to bring the audience into the conversation so that it is not one-sided," <highlight>Pass</highlight> says.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 帕斯说：“一定要让听众参与到对话中，这样对话就不会是片面的。”。

examination_example.sentence: Of course, it's possible to be a fountain of knowledge and a boring person, says public relations consultant Andrea <highlight>Pass</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 公共关系顾问安德里亚·帕斯说，当然，它也有可能成为知识的源泉和无聊的人。

sense_info_list.en: an official document or ticket showing that you have the right to go somewhere or use a particular form of transport
go past something by being greater in amount or degree

word_usage.usage: pass sb. sth.=pass sth. to sb.都表示“递某物给某人”。

pass表示“批准，通过”时，不能用于被动结构。
示例：该提议已经被当地政府批准通过。
误 The proposal has been passed by the local government.
正 The local government has passed the proposal.

单指参加考试或已参加完毕，但不提考试结果时不能用pass，要用take。pass指“考及格，通过”。
示例：我将在星期四参加音乐考试。
误 I am going to pass my music examination on Thursday.
正 I am going to take my music examination on Thursday.

exam_freq_info.chinese: 经过; 路过; 穿过
路过; 经过; 穿过

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 经过；通过；通道；走廊；过道；过渡；转变；一段；一节；章节；段落；乐段；巴沙基
n. 乘客；旅客；滥竽充数者；冗余人员

word_family.mean: v. 经过；穿过；通过；超过；越过；度过；消逝；流逝；传递；传送；转移；批准；宣布；排泄；放弃；弃权

sense_info_list.zh: 经过; 路过; 穿过

examination_example.sentence: The heat on the skin becomes the sensation of the sun and a machine that rings becomes a police car <highlight>passing</highlight> nearby.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 皮肤上的热量变成了太阳的感觉，一台响着的机器变成了一辆经过附近的警车。

examination_example.sentence: We <highlight>passed</highlight> it, he tried to put it in his mouth, he tried bouncing it, rolling it, sitting on it, throwing it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们经过时，他试着把它放进嘴里，他试着弹它、滚它、坐在它上面、扔它。

examination_example.sentence: Hurrying to school every day and having to <highlight>pass</highlight> exams sounds a bit too much for her.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每天匆匆忙忙地上学，还要通过考试，这对她来说听起来有点吃不消。

examination_example.sentence: Terrafugia says an owner would need to <highlight>pass</highlight> a test.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Terrafugia表示，所有者需要通过测试。

examination_example.sentence: You'd better have it if you want to <highlight>pass</highlight> that course.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你想通过那门课，你最好拥有它。

examination_example.sentence: To <highlight>pass</highlight> on a message.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 传递信息。

examination_example.sentence: Their prices may climb up as time <highlight>passes</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着时间的推移，他们的价格可能会攀升。

examination_example.sentence: Before I knew it an hour had <highlight>passed</highlight> and it was time to move on to lunch.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不知不觉一个小时过去了，该去吃午饭了。

examination_example.sentence: What is a direct result of the Act <highlight>passed</highlight> in 1934?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 1934年通过的法案的直接结果是什么？

examination_example.sentence: The epidemic (流行病) peak had <highlight>passed</highlight> in China as a whole.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 总体上，中国本轮疫情流行高峰已经过去。

examination_example.sentence: We all spoke the same language of <highlight>passes</highlight> and shots.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于传球和投篮，我们都说同样的语言。

examination_example.sentence: Freddy <highlight>passed</highlight> away on Thanksgiving.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 弗雷迪在感恩节去世了。

sense_info_list.zh: 路过; 经过; 穿过

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 经过；通过；通道；走廊；过道；过渡；转变；一段；一节；章节；段落；乐段；巴沙基
n. 乘客；旅客；滥竽充数者；冗余人员
adj. 经过的；路过的；过去的；流逝的；逝去的；微小的；快速的；轻松的

word_family.mean: v. 经过；穿过；通过；超过；越过；度过；消逝；流逝；传递；传送；转移；批准；宣布；排泄；放弃；弃权

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 昏倒；失去知觉；结束新兵训练；分发
经过；路过；（时间等的）逝去

sense_info_list.en: give something to someone

examination_example.sentence: Knowledge <highlight>passed</highlight> on in this method is called the spoken tradition.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 用这种方法传递的知识被称为口头传统。

examination_example.sentence: In some cultures everyone would <highlight>pass</highlight> along the stories.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在某些文化中，每个人都会传递故事。

examination_example.sentence: Before people developed writing, storytelling was the most important way to <highlight>pass</highlight> along information.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在人们发明书写之前，讲故事是传递信息最重要的方式。

sense_info_list.en: be successful in an exam, course, or others

examination_example.sentence: The kid is doing his lessons carefully in order to <highlight>pass</highlight> the test.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了通过考试，这个孩子正在认真地做功课。

examination_example.sentence: I am sure he can <highlight>pass</highlight> the English exam.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我确信他能通过英语考试。

examination_example.sentence: Last year, Malala <highlight>passed</highlight> the entrance examination of Oxford University through her hard work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 去年，马拉拉通过她的努力通过了牛津大学的入学考试。

sense_info_list.en: go past something or someone or move in relation to it, him, or her

examination_example.sentence: Sunlight <highlight>passes</highlight> down through the gases.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 阳光通过大气照射下来。

examination_example.sentence: Just as they were coming to blows, a lion happened to <highlight>pass</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 正当他们要打起来的时候，一只狮子碰巧经过。

examination_example.sentence: Over millions of years,the Colorado River wore away rocks as it <highlight>passed</highlight> through the area．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 数百万年来，科罗拉多河在流经该地区时磨损了岩石。

sense_info_list.en: go past a particular point in time

examination_example.sentence: Ten years has <highlight>passed</highlight> since that thing happened.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那件事已经过去十年了。

examination_example.sentence: Years have <highlight>passed</highlight>, but I still remember how it felt to struggle so hard at learning another language.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 几年过去了，但我仍然记得努力学习另一种语言的感觉。

examination_example.sentence: I learned that reading a book is the best way to <highlight>pass</highlight> time, especially if it is sunny．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我明白了读书是打发时间最好的方式，尤其是在阳光明媚的时候。

sense_info_list.en: go away

examination_example.sentence: His wife <highlight>passed</highlight> away one month ago.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的妻子一个月前去世了。

examination_example.sentence: Louis Cha Leung-yung, one of the greatest Chinese writers, <highlight>passed</highlight> away last year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 中国最伟大的作家之一金庸于去年去世。

examination_example.sentence: When did Stephen Hawking <highlight>pass</highlight> away?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 斯蒂芬·霍金是什么时候去世的？

examination_example.sentence: But on a day after her 14th birthday, she <highlight>passed</highlight> out (昏倒)and was rushed to the hospital.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是在她14岁生日后的一天，她晕倒了并且被紧急送往医院。

examination_example.sentence: She suffered from a disease that caused her to <highlight>pass</highlight> out at school.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她患了一种疾病，导致她在学校昏倒了。

examination_example.sentence: He found Michael Rogers's box was empty when he was <highlight>passing</highlight> out his valentines.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他在分发情人节礼物时发现Michael Roger 的盒子是空的。

examination_example.sentence: Wearing his red superhero costume, Ewan happily helped <highlight>pass</highlight> out 70 bag lunches to hungry people in a park.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 伊万穿着红色的超级英雄服装，在公园里开心地为饥饿的人们分发了70袋午餐。

examination_example.sentence: The flower went on, "My days have <highlight>passed</highlight> and I'm going to wither. That makes me so sad."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 花继续说:“我的日子已经结束了，我要枯萎了。这让我很难过。”

examination_example.sentence: Don't just wait for the storm to <highlight>pass</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不要只是等待暴风雨过去。

word_usage.usage:
单指参加考试或已参加完毕，但不提考试结果时不能用pass，要用take。pass指“考及格，通过”。
示例：我将在星期四参加音乐考试。
误 I am going to pass my music examination on Thursday.
正 I am going to take my music examination on Thursday.

pass表示“批准，通过”时，不能用于被动结构。
示例：该提议已经被当地政府批准通过。
误 The proposal has been passed by the local government.
正 The local government has passed the proposal.
pass sb. sth.=pass sth. to sb.都表示“递某物给某人”。
